title.native: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

description:
Haruka has been living his high school life as a loner, but all of a sudden, he and his classmates are summoned into another world. A God gives him a list of skills he can freely pick... Or at least that was how it was supposed to be, as all the valuable skills have been taken by the other classmates first. After Haruka scolded God, he snapped back and gave all the remaining bad skills to Haruka. Thanks to the "Loner" skill, Haruka begins his lonely adventure in another world.

(Source: Muse Asia)

Note: Each episode streamed a week early on some streaming services. The original TV broadcast started on October 4th, 2024.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

title.native: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略
ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

alternative: Volley-bu Ko A (バレー部っ娘A)

node.description:
__Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Blog](https://hh22.hatenablog.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/dne_bu_hh) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ひらさわひさよし)

Hisayoshi is a sound director and animation producer, and also the chairman of the animation studios [Creators in Pack](https://anilist.co/studio/6072) and [Passione](https://anilist.co/studio/911/Passione).
Akinari Suzuki is a composer and arranger.

__[Profile (TaWaRa)](http://www.ta-wa-ra.com/creator/hotaru) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hotar_)__ __hotaru__ is a Japanese lyricist and story planner for the band MYTH & ROID. He is affiliated with TaWaRa Inc.

[Profile (F.M.F)](http://www.fmf-music.com/members/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eba_cadode) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eba_1987_/)

Eba is a Japanese music producer, guitarist, composer, arranger and member of pop unit [cadode](https://twitter.com/cadode_). He is also affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

_Note: Not to be confused with the vocalist and lyricist with the same name [Hirokazu Ebata aka Eba](https://anilist.co/staff/161178)_

[Profile (F.M.F)](http://www.fmf-music.com/members/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eba_cadode) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eba_1987_/)

Eba is a Japanese music producer, guitarist, composer, arranger and member of pop unit [cadode](https://twitter.com/cadode_). He is also affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

_Note: Not to be confused with the vocalist and lyricist with the same name [Hirokazu Ebata aka Eba](https://anilist.co/staff/161178)_
